description: Data from cement packing and logistics

fields.packing_machine_speed_bags_min: float, packing machine speed in bags/min
fields.packing_machine_power_kw: float, power consumption of packing machine
fields.bag_weight_kg: float, weight of each bag in kg
fields.packing_machine_status: integer, status of the packing machine (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.bulk_loading_rate_tph: float, bulk loading rate in tonnes per hour
fields.truck_loading_time_min: float, average truck loading time in minutes
fields.daily_dispatch_tonnes: float, daily dispatch volume in tonnes
fields.dispatch_rate_tph: float, dispatch rate in tonnes per hour
fields.silo_overpressure_alarm: integer, silo overpressure alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.packing_machine_jam_alarm: integer, packing machine jam alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.truck_delay_alarm: integer, truck delay alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
